info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 1:36PM EDT until August 29 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Columbiana County in east central Ohio... Northern Beaver County in western Pennsylvania... Southern Lawrence County in western Pennsylvania... Southwestern Butler County in west central Pennsylvania... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 136 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Palestine, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Cranberry, New Castle, Beaver Falls, Columbiana, Monaca, East Palestine, Economy, Ellwood City, New Brighton, Beaver, Calcutta, and Zelienople. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
